self.title: CDISC SDTM Tuberculosis Findings About Test Code Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the test codes that describe findings about a tuberculosis event or intervention.
name: Tuberculosis Findings About Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Tuberculosis Findings About Test Code Terminology

terms.definition: The state or condition of not responding to a pharmacological agent.
The longest possible length of a straight line passing through the center of a circular or spheroid object that connects two points on the circumference.
An indication as to whether something has happened, such as an event or incident.
A measurement of the total number of entities.
